description: This file sets up a PDF knowledge base with document chunking and vector database, then creates an agent to query the knowledge base about Thai recipes.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with the knowledge base and handles queries.

classes.name: DocumentChunking
classes.description: Strategy for chunking documents into smaller parts.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: Knowledge base that loads PDF documents from URLs and processes them.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: Vector database interface using PostgreSQL with pgvector extension.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating the data.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent's response to a query, optionally formatted in markdown.
